ingredients: 2 cups papaya - peeled, seeded and cubed, 2 cups milk,   +   1/4 cup white sugar,   +   1/4 cup sweetened condensed milk, 1 cup vanilla yogurt, 2 tablespoons cream cheese, 2 cups ice
nutrition: Total Fat 5g 6%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 18mg 6%, Sodium 92mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 29g 11%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 28g, Protein 6g, Vitamin C 30mg 149%, Calcium 216mg 17%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 385mg 8%
